name: ReportTypeColumn

methods.name: getDataType
methods.description: Returns the data type of the field.

methods.name: getFilterValues
methods.description: If the field data type is picklist, multi-select picklist, boolean, or checkbox, returns all filter values for a field. For example, checkbox fields always have a value of true or false. For fields of other data types, the filter value is an empty array, because their values can’t be determined.

methods.name: getFilterable
methods.description: If the field is of a type that can’t be filtered, returns False. For example, fields of the type Encrypted Text can’t be filtered.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the localized display name of the field.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the unique API name of the field.

description: Contains detailed report type metadata about a field, including data type, display name, and filter values.
